recommendations.recommendation: Pretty awesome... why no recommendations? Go watch it now!

anime.description: He woke up in a familiar world that has vastly changed. His school has become a school that teaches magic, encouraging everyone to become a mighty magician. Outside the city, many wandering magical beasts and monsters attack and prey on humans. A world of advanced science, changed into one of advanced magic. Despite this, his ambition in life, and his situation remains the same. One of the dregs of the society with a struggling father and a disabled step sister that couldn`t walk. However, Mo Fan found when everyone can only have one major element, he can do much more!

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: magic
tag.description: Magic is the art of purportedly manipulating aspects of reality either by supernatural means or through knowledge of unknown occult laws.

tag.name: dynamic
tag.description: Some of the central structural elements in anime are: Plot Continuity How does the plot or several plots unfold. Are they a strictly linear retelling of one big continuing story, a serial, possibly with several side stories, or is the content chopped into a set of unconnected episodes, only sharing the same setting and characters? Stereotype Characters Then there is the question of the character set presentation. Is it completely original, or is it your usual stereotypical character cast. Both choices have their merit, for example it would not really make much sense to reinvent the wheel for a harem anime. Fans of that genre come to expect their favourite stereotype protagonists. Plot Twists Finally there is the question of how complex the plot / the story unfolds. Are there side-plots that merge into the main plot leading to unexpected plot twists, or is the anime quite predictable? The latter would not be appropriate for detective stories. In harem anime on the other hand a foreseeable outcome is actually something the fans will come to expect.

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: novel
tag.description: A novel is a relatively long work of narrative fiction, normally written in prose form, and which is typically published as a book. Manga, comics, or visual novels do not fit this description and are not considered novels; including a small number of illustrations, however, is still permissible, which means that light novels are considered novels.

tag.name: fantasy
tag.description: Fantasy is a genre of fiction that uses magic and other supernatural phenomena as a primary element of plot, theme, or setting. Many works within the genre take place in fictional worlds where magic is common. Fantasy is generally distinguished from science fiction and horror by the expectation that it steers clear of (pseudo-)scientific and macabre themes, respectively, though there is a great deal of overlap between the three (which are subgenres of speculative fiction). In popular culture, the genre of fantasy is dominated by its medievalist form, especially since the worldwide success of The Lord of the Rings books by J. R. R. Tolkien. In its broadest sense however, fantasy comprises works by many writers, artists, filmmakers, and musicians, from ancient myths and legends to many recent works embraced by a wide audience today. Fantasy is a vibrant area of academic study in a number of disciplines (English, cultural studies, comparative literature, history, medieval studies). Work in this area ranges widely, from the structuralist theory of Tzvetan Todorov, which emphasizes the fantastic as a liminal space, to work on the connections (political, historical, literary) between medievalism and popular culture Source: Wiki

tag.name: comedy
tag.description: Anime whose central struggle causes hilarious results. These stories are built upon funny characters, situations and events. A comedy anime is laced with humour and sets out to provoke laughter from the audience. Japanese humour can be a bit strange to westerners, so if you`re new to this type of humour, just bear with it; it`ll most likely grow on you if you`re a fan of other kinds of comedy.

tag.name: social class issues
tag.description: A character`s standing in society is cause of many issues. More generally, the society`s class structure is the source of many problems in the anime. A common example is class division; a strong and rigid class division between rich/elite and poor/commoners, with the elites having disproportionately more privilege than the common class. This can be applied not only when royalty and nobility are present, but also dystopian societies display often these divisions. Another example is a division between employees and management, with employees akin to the common class, and management akin to the elite class.

tag.name: training
tag.description: Training is extensive, serious practising a person undergoes in order to develop skills and abilities, such as handling weapons, playing instruments, playing sports, and so on.

tag.name: science and magic coexist
tag.description: In this anime science and magic do not exclude each other. Magic here is actually very advanced, artefact- and/or ritual-based science.

tag.name: DESCRIPTION MISSING
tag.description: The description for this entry is missing. e.g plot, biography... Please help by adding it, and remove this tag afterwards. Thank you.

tag.name: social commentary
tag.description:
Social commentary is the act of rebelling against an individual, or a group of people by rhetorical means. This is most often done with the idea of implementing or promoting change by informing the general populace about a given problem and appealing to people’s sense of justice. (Source: Wikipedia)
Since this is anime, usually, the mores of Japan and the Japanese society are scrutinised, but not restricted to that.

tag.name: time skip
tag.description: The plot features at least one skip or jump in time. Example: A skip from the present into the past, or time skips in increments, e.g. every hour there is a time skip by a day.

tag.name: nearly almighty protagonist
tag.description: Man 1: "Hey man, did you see me take down that guy over there, there`s no way he could have survived that!" Man 2: "Yeah I know what you mean, it would take the strength of 1 million men to be able to ..... HE`S GETTING BACK UP!!?!?" *synonymous jaws dropping* This anime`s main character is comparable to the gods themselves in terms of resistibility, strength and/or downright bad-assery. Whenever they seem as if the fire inside has burnt out, they rise from the ashes with enough tenacity and ferocity to vanquish any foe that dare stand against them.

tag.name: magic school
tag.description: A school where magic is taught.

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: half-length episodes
tag.description: Half-length episodes are regular episodes that are somewhat shorter than the standard length. This includes episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length; shows with episodes up to and including 10 minutes are http://anidb.net/t5852 [short episodes] instead.

tag.name: isekai
tag.description:
An isekai story is one in which the lead characters are transferred to and become stuck or trapped in another world, one completely different from the one they lived in up until the transfer. The new world is commonly a http://anidb.net/t2628 [fictional world], such as a http://anidb.net/t2838 [parallel world] or http://anidb.net/t2839 [virtual world] (other fictional world types can also apply). What defines the isekai genre is that the characters are sent to another world, often but not always a parallel one, and they generally cannot come back permanently without meeting a highly specific goal. In order to adapt to their new environment, they must use the abilities and knowledge brought from their former world as well as any that may have been bestowed upon them by their brave new world. In some cases, they will seek and eventually find a way to return; in others, they will gleefully embrace their new life. http://anidb.net/a144 [Inuyasha] is an example where isekai applies to a fictional world that is not also a parallel or virtual world. http://anidb.net/ch7246 [Higurashi Kagome] climbs down an ancient well at her grandfather`s shrine and is transported to feudal Japan (time travel). While she eventually gains the physical ability to travel back and forth between her time period and feudal Japan, her bonds and responsibilities to feudal Japan tie her there until they are ultimately resolved. For clarity, below is an illustrative example where isekai is applied to a non-fictional, non-parallel, non-virtual world.
* The main characters are from Earth. One day, they are abducted by Nazis from Mars (alternate "world") are brought back to their Martian base. The main characters are trapped on Mars. Their only escape is to defeat the Nazis and steal their spaceship to return to Earth (specific goal required to escape); they are left to thier own devices, with no prospect of help from Earth, and no way to contact Earth.

tag.name: STAFF MISSING
tag.description: This anime is missing staff credits. If you can, please assign staff credits to the anime accordingly and then remove the tag. If the tag is set on an anime level, please assign preferably all credits and then remove it from the anime. If that is not feasible, please assign, at a minimum, credits for all the major/key staff and then transfer it to all relevant episodes (broadly speaking, regular episodes and S-type episodes containing animation). If the tag is already set on an episode level, please assign all credits, including minor staff, to the episode and then remove the tag from it. Likewise, this tag should either be applied on an anime level, when it is missing key staff (in full or in part), or to all relevant episodes, when key staff is present but at least some episodes don`t have full staff. For further information on assigning staff credits, please see http://wiki.anidb.net/Content:Staff_Credits [the AniDB Wiki article on them].

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Mo Fan
character.description: Mo Fan is a 16 year old, high school student. In his first awakening he awakened both the lightning and fire elements. Mo Fan was not from this world, in his world he was a genius student. Mo Fan received an old broken black pendant from a old man guarding the rear gate of his old school, after he took a nap in the mountain behind the school he woke up to a world with magic. The people he knows, students, teachers, father, sister have not changed, but the whole world is no longer focused on science and technology but into the research of magic.

character.name: Ye Xin Xia
character.description: Mo`s non-blood sister, gentle and kind, she followed her mother into Mo Fan`s family who married Mo Jia Xin. For certain reasons, left Mo Jia Xin shortly after marriage and abandoned Xin Xia. Xin Xia is born with symptoms similar to muscular dystrophy in her legs. She cannot stand or walk for no more than a few steps. Her mother`s irresponsible actions did not stop Mo Fan from having a good relationship with her. In fact, he will become enraged if he hears anyone calls or imply that she is a crippled.

character.name: Mo Jia Xing
character.description: Mo Jia Xing is a father of Mo Fan and also step father of Ye Xin Xia. He work as a delivery driver for Mo Zhao Yun at Bo City.

character.name: Mu Bai
character.description: From young, Mu Bai has been very hard working and has very good results. He has very strong rivalry towards Mo Fan because despite being academically better, Mo Fan always ends up being the person everyone in their age group follows including Mu Ning Xue. Mu Bai has been outclassed by Mo Fan and Mu Ning Xue greatly, but he is not to be underestimated as one must remember that both Mo Fan and Mu Ning Xue possess items that helps them improve their cultivation speed while Mu Bai is depending solely on his own talent and hard work.

character.name: Xue Mu Sheng
character.description: Xue Mu Sheng home room instructor of class 8 later promoted to the homeroom teacher for the elite class. Since his class came out with two S grade student. Thanks to Mo Fan, Xue Mu Sheng is getting a lot of fire from the school`s leaderships, to do something about this Mo Fan`s rebellious character.

character.name: Tang Yue
character.description: Class Instructor, after becoming a top class practice teacher. Major in fire magic. Her beauty, figure and brains makes her the dream lover for majority if not all the boys in their school. As the saying goes: If you want to make money, marry Tang Yue. Often helps Mo Fan. Mid Tier Mage presently in the Animation. Possess Fire and Shadow Magic.

character.name: Mu Ning Xue
character.description: Bo City`s Mu shi family eldest, born with ice magic and has extraordinary qualifications. Mu Zhao Yun`s daughter, a rare genius ice magician. At 15 years old was admitted to the empire magical university . Majoring in ice. She is Mo Fan`s childhood sweetheart. Like Mo Fan, she is also one of the World`s Top 100 Listed Naturally Talented individuals, she is in possession of the Natural Born Spirit Element. Her talent makes her Ice Element incredibly powerful giving her a natural 2 times and more increase in power and potency in all Ice magic she uses. It was later revealed that this talent increases in potency boost as her cultivation level increases and can further evolves Ice Spirit Element into Soul Element.

character.name: Patriarch Mu Zhuo Yun
character.description: He is the head of the Mu Family in Bo City, father of the female lead character Mu Ning Xue. Initially he has a good opinion about Mo Fan as the boy was extremely bright. However, as Mo Fan grew older and became rebellious, deliberately scoring badly in school by handing over empty exam paper out of spite and later tried to elope with his daughter.

character.name: Cai Tang
character.description: Cai Tang belongs to one of the minor families related to the Mu Family. As she is more distantly related to the Main family and has not shown any particular talents in magic, she does not have the same treatment as her younger cousin Mu Ning Xue.

character.name: Zhan Kong
character.description: Zhan Kong a high ranking military officer with vast combat experience with monsters. He already reached the maximum level of all his three Elements at High Tier when he first appeared. One can already see that he has Fire and Wind Element in first season and that his Wind Element was already maxed out at High Tier as he sprout 6 Wings which is the max a High Tier Wind Mage can do.

character.name: Zhou Min
character.description: One of the teacher`s daughter. She is one of the more outstanding classmates of Mo Fan who awakens Fire Element. Her nickname was Violent girl.

character.name: Zhang Xiao Hou
character.description: Mo Fan`s classmate and one of his best friends. Major in wind magic. He is outstanding but humble and kind.

character.name: Xu Zhaoting
character.description: The only other student in Tiian Lan Magic High School in Mo Fan`s batch to have awaken the lightning element. He is consider a friend to Mo Fan but is also very jealous of him as Mo Fan has two Elements and raised both of them higher than his Lightning.

episode.title: Magic Duel! Mo Fan vs Yu Ang
